name: Quality Street Carton 350G
description: Assorted milk and dark chocolates and toffees
Enjoying chocolate as part of a varied, balanced diet and a healthy lifestyle, is one of life's little pleasures.
The Nestlé Cocoa Plan™ is working with UTZ Certified to support cocoa farmers for better chocolate.
Scan the QR code on the back of the carton to learn more about the nutritional, environmental and social aspects of this product.
usage: <Cooking_Instructions><Number_Of_Uses>17 Contains approximately 17 servings</Number_Of_Uses><Preparation_and_Usage>The chocolates may become white in warm conditions as a result of cocoa butter moving to the surface, but are still safe to enjoy.</Preparation_and_Usage></Cooking_Instructions>
ingredients: Milk Chocolate contains Milk Solids 14% minimum
